personal.name: Arumugam Panchatcharam
personal.title: Principle Engineer at DTDL
personal.summary: Embedded systems and wireless software professional with 12+ years of industry experience in WiFi, broadband, and networking platforms. Strong background in 802.11 WLAN, Linux-based embedded systems, and system-level debugging. Currently upskilling toward AI/ML-driven system intelligence, aligned with next-generation of WiFi for the AI Edge integrating AI-Ready and AI-Aware. Actively working on an AI-based log analysis side project to bridge domain expertise with data-driven intelligence.

experience.title: Principle Engineer
experience.description:
2023-06 to 2025-03: T-Systems ICT India Pvt Ltd as Senior consultant
2025-04 to current: Deutsche Telekom Digital Labs (internal transition under same parent company)
achievements: Primarily worked on WiFi-7 (802.11BE) + EasyMesh (EMR6) with Airties integration for Mediatek SOC
Deployed solution in Germany as SpeedPort-7 (AP CPE) and SpeedPort 7 Plus (Extender)

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Bootloader development for Comcast STB, Gateways, Router and Charter STB, Router, EMTA
Managing Factory package release for LAB, FGR, Pilot and MP
Package contains bootloader, PCI images, fuse OTP's and provision data

experience.title: Embedded Developer I
achievements: Worked in Modem Abstraction Layer (MAL) of 4G LTE modem with direct interaction with Host through AT or MBIM commands
Design and implementation of MDL (message description language) to decode Network IE's and USIM files
Design and implementation of FSM's for USIM interface and MBIM CID's

experience.title: Embedded Associate Executive
achievements: Experience working with AT89C51 and PIC 18F family of micro-controllers
Mini project on Facial recognition with OpenCV and Raspberry Pi
Mini project on Remote monitoring of wind turbine params with CAN and PIC
